g.text: cards are provided by the first client.
New player tries to connect and join the lobby.
La mia idea qui era quella di notificare il giocatore
che ha resettato la lobby e chiedergl i parametri
per una nuova lobby, ma sorgono parecchi problemi
When the lobby is full, game can start.
[The nickname isn't in the server's saving]
[The nickname is one of the previous player's nick]
[Nickname choosen by the player is not available]
[New player joins a brand new lobby]
